channel.title: Source?
channel.description:
I need help chosing a source.
Server based on islands. There should be a few islands that are safezones. and some other islands will be pk zones.
buts thats no problem. the problem is i need a source that already has anciants and range. (if possible)
pleae give me a name of a source that i could use and please tell me what other skills that it has added. (So that i know what i have to add)
~Joery~

item.title: Source?
item.dc:creator: @mresi5656 mresi5656
item.description:
@mresi5656 wrote:

Yes testscape is my personal favorite base.

Only one thing I don’t like is you can’t see spells flying through the air.

No problem with blitz and barrage but ye…

Read full topic

item.title: Source?

@J03RY wrote:

Meh, i dont like Summoning to be added =(
So i’l try TestScape for now.

Read full topic

item.title: Source?
item.dc:creator: @Zenadix Zenadix
item.description:
@Zenadix wrote:

Source Name: Project16 v.6 (update 80)

See download list for info

–V.2 Features–

-Full Herblore with pots
-Converse with snow
-KBD attacks with Fire breath
-Low Alch
-High Alch
-Enhance ALL jewelry
-Superheat Item
-Magic on players in wilderness(Emotes + Correct Damge and GFX)
-Face NPC when Attacking
-Face NPC when Maging
-Face NPC when Pickpocketing
-Face Object when Clicking/Using
-Couple new commands
-Switch between magics and ancients
-Worshiping
-Alignments
-Full Pickpocketing with GFX and Emotes
-Auto Restart when crash

–V.3 Features–

-Stat bugs FIXED
-New interface commands(testing purposes)
-Full Demon attack emotes!
-Guthan set effect
-Ancient spells (All for npcs, Ice and Shadow barrage for pking)
-90% Ancient Teleports
-85% Ranging!(Dont have arrows installed yet. Max range hit based off range lvl!)
-FULL MAGIC ON PLAYER(Pking and CastleWars!)
-Lots of weapon emotes
-New items in shops
-Some new NPCs
-AutoSave! (Saves EVERYONES account every 60 seconds)
-Fixed Potions (Thanks Drags for all your help, Pots work now)
-Set effects for the 3 melee barrow brothers
-New method for magic (doesnt crash anymore)
-Fixed some item slots
-Fixed Device(cannon) makes you fly!
-Complete help Menu
-Easy Teleport to CastleWars and Wilderness

–V.4 Features–

-Base Ability for Summon
-Mod Bot
-New spawn area(Tzhaar)
-More NPC’s including Tzhaar npcs
-Shops and banks for Tzhaar
-Ojbects for Tzhaar
-Gnome Agility Course
-Max for stats raised to 135
-Jad cave with intense training and tons of NPCs
-TzHaar mages attack with flames
-Added some new items like:
*-Fire Cape
*-Dragon 2H
*-Obby Cape
*-Full Infinity
*-Fury Amulate
*-Mage Book
*-Dragon Hatchet
-Fixed Login Problem
-Reduced autospawn to reduce lag
-Pking Area for TzHaar!
-Added more commands
-Teleport a player to you
-Teleport to a player
-Teleports now 100%!
-Ancient Teleports now 100%!
-Added Global Drops!!
-Added Drop items when you die!
-Added Full Pking Modern Magic with GFX and Projectiles
-Fixed Global drops and full pickup method!
-Added Teleother(Not working correctly)
-Added Multi Target Barrages
-Fixed Multi Ice and Shadow Barrages!
-Completly redid magic…again…
-Fixed HitPoint Bug
-Added support for summoning
-Added working pets!
-Added Global Objects
-Fixed NPC Spawns
-Put a timer Pking Ice Barrages
-Fixed Teleother!
-Added Temp Player look
-Got Full Item.cfg
-Added loads of npcs
-Added support for New NPCs + Areas
-Face NPC Bug Fixed!!!
-Added Dungeons, Guilds, Shops
-Added more bows for Ranging
-Secured AutoSpawn and fixed NPC Hits bug
-ALL BUGS FIXED! (No more crashes!)
-Project16 Fully Secured, No Serious bugs
-Added Retribution Prayer
-Working ALL Prayers!
-Added Prayer Head Icons!
-Added all Strength Prayers
-Prayer restores over time
-Made HeadIcon testing command
-FIXED INVISABLE PLAYER BUGS COMPLETLY!!!
-Added Amour Defense Bonuses
-Added Fully Bronze-Dragon Defense bonuses 100%
-Added Barrows + Godly Armor Defense Bonuses
-Fixed Dragon Hide Top Glitch Green-Black

–V.6 Features–
-Converted from whitescape to cheezscape Update 80
-Added full pickpocketing
-Fixed thieving and woodcutting
-Fixed Magic Projectiles, Lvl reqs, and damages
-Cleaned up a lot of cheezscape
-Disabled most logs to reduce lag ALOT
-Wildy Level
-Dueling + Staking
-Teleblock
-Teleother
-Recoded Autosave, Saves File + Moreinfo File
-Imported All commands from P16
-ADDED HERBLORE + WORKING POTS!
-Fixed all Dragon hide glitches
-Added new npcs and deleted useless ones
-Login bug fixed the right way
-No more player limit on logins
-Fixed Shops
-Arrows for ranged
-Full Ancients
-Multi Barrages now ignore NPCs with 0 Health (thanks fassy)
-Added some Ardy Thieving stalls with lvls and emotes
-Full Barrows!
-Added Summoning the right way
-Dragon BattleAxe Special attack
-Added WorldObject autospawn (thanks Ramen)
-Put in Bolloons are Party Pete’s
-Fixed Dragon Battle Special, energy comes back over time

Castle Wars*
–Working now
–Sets hooded cloak for each new player
–Some doors and ladders fixed
–Glows (Red glow for Zammy,Blue for Sara)
–Complete pking system inside CW
–Magic on players in CW
–Get a Christmas Cracker everytime you score a point
–Same CW as all of you were playing when my server was online
---------------------------------------END OF UPDATES-------------------------------------

Update 80 info: Added dialogue handler
Update 79 info: Added duel arena!
Update 78 info: Fixed projectiles, and added all strike, bolt, blast and wave spells
Update 77 info: Make over mage and smithing fixed
Update 76 info: You now walk to object before doing action like real rs
Update 75 info: FULL woodcutting, works great, also a few bug fixes
Update 74 info: Teleother
Update 73 info: You keep your 3 most valuable items when you die!
Update 72 info: Added a limit to npcs you can summon and also made it so all your summoned npcs die when you logout
Update 71 info: Added SUMMONING skill
Update 70 info: Added support for poisoning npcs and now ice barrage hits multiple targets!
Update 69 info: Added Spells Of The Gods quest! Tested and fully working!
Update 68 info: Fixed cooking up so you have a chance of burning depends on level and gaunlets
Update 67 info: Added Hidden points, you get points for doing secret commands etc
Update 66 info: Made timers 5x as fast on skills, magic xp has doubled and added backup save feature
Update 65 info: Added pk points, kill and death counts.
Update 64 info: Added full range, deletes arrow from equipment slot and arrow appears on floor, has proper bonuses too
Update 63 info: Wilderness levels
Update 62 info: Instead of blood runes there is ecto tokens, this stops server from crashing
Update 61 info: Added teleblock!
Update 60 info: Added GLOBAL GRAPHICS!!!
Update 59 info: Added Chaos Elemental which can remove your item when your attacks (random though)
Update 58 info: Added weather, changes from morning to afternoon, from afternoon to evening etc. depending on the time, also randomly changes weather every 20 mins from either snow, sandstorm or normal.
Update 57 info: Friends/Ignore list fully working, saves as well.
Update 56 info: Cook’s Assistant Quest fully working!
Update 55 info: Bones To Bananas Spell
Update 54 info: Invisible Armour Quest fully working!
Update 53 info: Added working clues
Update 52 info: Added Dr Jad
Update 51 info: Added 362 items and map support
Update 50 info: Added spells requiring runes
Update 49 info: Converted from mythscape base to whitescape base
Update 48 info: Added ancient magicks with working spells on players
Update 47 info: Added server status
Update 46 info: Added new dungeon with kbd
Update 45 info: Added global items
Update 44 info: Added timed attacking and new weapons
Update 43 info: Added logout timers
Update 42 info: Added herblore stall
Update 41 info: Added fletching skill
Update 40 info: Added smithing and herblore
Update 39 info: Added ranged pking
Update 38 info: Added abyssal demons with drops
Update 37 info: Added orb of light
Update 36 info: Added openable doors
Update 35 info: Added enchanting and high alching
Update 34 info: Added proper trading and energy
Update 33 info: Added more doors, bank chests and disabled wildy teleporting
Update 32 info: Added prayer training area
Update 31 info: Added weapon timers
Update 30 info: Added proper pking so items is dropped and dupe bug is now fixed
Update 29 info: Added equipment requirements
Update 28 info: Added god capes (changed area) and working mage bank lever
Update 27 info: Fixed hp bug
Update 26 info: Added strength bonuses
Update 25 info: Added losing items when dying (don’t drop on floor though)
Update 24 info: Added abyss
Update 23 info: Fixed crashing client bug on ancient gate, and took out scythes
Update 22 info: Added very basic trading (use item on player to give item)
Update 21 info: Added god capes
Update 20 info: Added new death place and updatestats feature
Update 19 info: Made training faster
Update 18 info: Added 3 new slayer objects
Update 17 info: Added restore command to fix broken stats
Update 16 info: Changed max skill level from 99 to 135
Update 15 info: Added more items
Update 14 info: Added legends cape
Update 13 info: Added runecraft skill
Update 12 info: Fixed dupe bug
Update 11 info: Party hat spawning bug fixed and removed from game
Update 10 info: Added working clues
Update 9 info: Added stat viewer
Update 8 info: Added 3 more menus
Update 7 info: Fixed level requirement bug
Update 6 info: Fixed keep on dying bug
Update 5 info: Hp back to full after dying
Update 4 info: Added god staves
Update 3 info: Added new theiving area
Update 2 info: Added first ever quest
Update 1 info: Fixed minor message bug and added silver stalls

Read full topic
